comments.body: Per the test internally, this needs to be changed to pass all tests. But let's see the Jenkins result first.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +103,107 @@    // Since HIVE-23980, calcite-core included in Hive package jar.
    // For spark, only VersionsSuite currently creates a hive materialized view for testing.
    case object v2_3 extends HiveVersion("2.3.8",
      exclusions = Seq("org.apache.calcite:calcite-core",
        "org.apache.calcite:calcite-druid",
